description.value:
The golden religious symbol on the top of this spherical incense holder shifts its form to match the faith of its bearer. You gain no benefit from a judgment thurible if you don't worship a deity. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 35.

  • Armor After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the thurible casts 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protection] on you, with a duration of 1 round.

  • Weapon After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the weapon gains a rune that lasts until the end of your next turn. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Holy] rune if your deity allows holy sanctification or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Unholy] rune if your deity allows unholy sanctification. If your deity allows both, you can choose which rune the weapon gains. If your deity allows neither, your weapon doesn't gain a rune. The extra damage from this rune is 2d6.
